cellar.description:
Well, here we are in a cellar.

 You see a rack. [if there is something on the s_0]On the rack you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

scullery.description:
You've entered a scullery. You can barely contain your excitement.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is an unblocked exit to the east.

cubicle.description:
I never took you for the sort of person who would show up in a cubicle, but I guess I was wrong. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a coffer.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The coffer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Oh, great. Here's a stand. The stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

office.description:
A laminated board tells you that you are now in the office.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] bureau, which looks normal, close by.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_2]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The bureau is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south.

closet.description:
You are in a closet. An ordinary one.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_3]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

kitchenette.description:
Ah, the kitchenette. This is some kind of kitchenette, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere.

 You make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fridge.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_4]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The fridge is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

recreation zone.description:
You find yourself in a recreation zone. A standard one.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

chamber.description:
You've entered a chamber. The room is well lit.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

pantry.description:
You're now in the pantry. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

attic.description:
You've entered an attic. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] toolbox.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a workbench. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the workbench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You see a table. You shudder, but continue examining the table. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north.
